channel.title: WnCC
channel.description: We're WnCC, the Web and Coding Club of IIT Bombay. We code and help people code. Being the chief coding organisation of one of the most sought after technical institutions in the country, we have some of the very best programmers working with us. This page enlists our ongoing activities. It is maintained by the coding community at IIT-B. We're wncc-iitb on most services. Also, we love XKCD.
